document_data.name: Perigrog Scrapedust
document_data.mainbody: '''Perigrog Scrapedust''' was a [[deep gnome]] and owner of the [[Whiteshell Mine]], a salt mine, in [[Blingdenstone]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was fair minded but demanding of his workers.
document_data.Activities: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Perigrog tried to get the mine to produce as much [[salt]] as possible, in order to export as much as possible, so that this would restore the city's fortunes sooner.
